snippet.title: False Rebirth: Enhanced Edition - Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the game right now: 
https://sigmasuccour.itch.io/false-rebirth-enhanced-edition

False Rebirth is a psychological, story-focused game about the last remaining human, and his search for meaning in a post-apocalyptic world where everyone else is dead.



False Rebirth: Enhanced Edition is a port of my old, RPG Maker MV game to MZ. With updated graphics, better performance, and an extra ending.
Discord Invite: https://discord.gg/hVVdm5Z (Do join in!)

This trailer does not fully represent the actual game. As it's a narrative-driven game, with heavy dialogue. (Which this trailer doesn't show.)
For a more story-oriented trailer for the game, check out the trailer for the original version here: 
https://youtu.be/Xbm1WKfHD4U

Side note: The resolution for this trailer is low. Since what I wanted to do with this trailer required a sharp recording at 60 fps. And I just wasn't able to get as smooth of a recording at a higher resolution. 


----- DOWNLOAD LINKS: (Only for Windows)
https://sigmasuccour.itch.io/false-rebirth-enhanced-edition
or
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1_OadxeXEt-ajYL8a3HCigryQtueUxjem/view?usp=sharing
https://gamejolt.com/games/false-rebirth-enhanced-edition/537664
https://www.kartridge.com/games/SigmaSuccour/false-rebirth-enhanced-edition
https://www.freem.ne.jp/win/game/24014


BGM Used: 'Aimless' by Punch Deck
https://youtu.be/DO0pcp2emAk

#Indiegame #Trailer #RPGMaker
